participant.yourTurn: It's your turn! Select a category.
participant.waitingForSelection: Waiting for a player to select a category.

errors.sixLines: Input must have exactly 6 non-empty lines (1 category + 5 questions)
errors.questionFormat: Invalid format on question {{number}}. Must be "Q{{number}}: [Question] | A: [Answer]"
errors.answerFormat: Answer {{number}} must start with "What is/was", "Who is/was", "Where is/was", or "When is"

prompt.strictFormatNote: Make sure each answer is phrased as a question starting with "What/Who/Where/When is/was".
prompt.anyFormatNote: Answers can be in any format.
prompt.formatExample:
Category: [Name]
Q1: [Question] | A: [Answer]
Q2: [Question] | A: [Answer]
Q3: [Question] | A: [Answer]
Q4: [Question] | A: [Answer]
Q5: [Question] | A: [Answer]

aiInput.validAnswerStarts: what is,who is,where is,when is,where was,who was,what was
